description: The skills associated with a Logistics Request.

columns.name: HLR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HL_REQ_SKILL_C_NAME
columns.description:
The skills associated with this Logistics Request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: HL_SKILL_IS_REQUIRED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the skills associated with this Logistics Request are required. 


May contain organization-specific values: No

No


Yes
